title.narrative: OUTPUT 4.5. TECHNICAL SUPPORT Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH)

description.narrative: Support to the Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) component, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 4: By the end of 2021, women and children in the 11 target regions, especially the most vulnerable, make greater and sustainable use of safe drinking water and sanitation services and adopt good hygiene practices to prevent diseases.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Availability of qualified human resources and financial resources allowed for effective implementation of the WASH interventions in both emergency and development contexts. UNICEF staff skills and experience in creating an enabling environment and developing strategic partnerships, along with the commitment of the various stakeholders were essential for achieving the results. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:08/02/2020
